comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Frank Orren Lowden (January 26, 1861 – March 20, 1943) was a Republican Party politician from Illinois, who served as the 25th Governor of Illinois and as a United States Representatives from Illinois. He was also a candidate for the Republican presidential nominations in 1920 and 1928." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Orren_Lowden
